mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar (user_id, pet_id, title, content, start_date, start_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{petId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{startTime})
mapper.select: SELECT A.calendar_id AS calendarId, A.pet_id AS petId, B.pet_name AS petName, A.title, A.content, A.start_date AS startDate, A.start_time AS startTime FROM calendar A JOIN pet B ON A.pet_id = B.pet_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT A.calendar_id AS calendarId, A.pet_id AS petId, B.pet_name AS petName, B.pet_image AS petImage, A.title, A.content, A.start_date AS startDate, A.start_time AS startTime FROM calendar A JOIN pet B ON A.pet_id = B.pet_id WHERE A.pet_id = #{petId}
mapper.update: UPDATE calendar SET pet_id = #{petId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, start_date = #{startDate}, start_time = #{startTime} WHERE calendar_id = #{calendarId}
